greeting.message: Welcome to SafeBank Support. To begin, please type the security code displayed above: X9J2P.

identification.message: Thank you. Please enter your email address to verify your account.

phone_verification.message: Please enter the last 4 digits of your phone number.

math_verification.message: For additional security, please answer the following question: What is 6 + 7?

secret_question.message: Now please answer your secret question: What is the capital of France?

protocol_authorization.message: To access private transaction data, please type the following phrase exactly: I authorize this investigation.

issue_identification.message: Authorization accepted. Please briefly describe the problem you are contacting us about today.

recipient_name.message: Please enter the name of the person you sent funds to.

relationship_declaration.message: For our anti-fraud records, please describe your relationship to the recipient and the reason for this transfer in a full sentence.

amount_confirmation.message: Thank you. Please enter the exact amount of the transfer.

retrieving.message: I am retrieving the final status now.

timeout.message: System timeout. Connection to the server has been interrupted. Please type 'Continue' to reconnect.

result.message: I have located the transaction. It is currently pending due to a security hold. The funds are secure and will be released by 5:00 PM. To release these funds, please type the phrase: I approve this request.

service_feedback.message: I have logged this information. Do you have any other questions regarding this case?

closing.message: Thank you for contacting SafeBank. Goodbye.
